pages.title: Mining Tools
pages.text: Four mining strategies, from simple to complex:$(br2)$(bold)1. Mine Ores$() — Scan nearby for visible ores and mine them. Good for exposed caves or mountains.$(br)$(thing)"Mine some iron"$(br2)$(bold)2. Strip Mine$() — Dig a tunnel at the optimal Y-level. Finds ores in walls as it goes.$(br)$(thing)"Strip mine for diamonds"$(br2)$(bold)3. Create Mine$() — Build a permanent mine with shaft, hub room, and branch tunnels. Remembered across sessions!$(br)$(thing)"Create a diamond mine"$(br2)$(bold)4. Dig Down$() — Dig a walkable staircase shaft from current position.$(br)$(thing)"Dig down 20 blocks"

pages.title: Ore Y-Levels (1.21)
pages.text: Optimal Y-levels for each ore:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Coal$(): Y=96 (Any pick)$(li)$(bold)Copper$(): Y=48 (Any pick)$(li)$(bold)Iron$(): Y=16 (Stone pick+)$(li)$(bold)Lapis$(): Y=0 (Stone pick+)$(li)$(bold)Gold$(): Y=-16 (Iron pick+)$(li)$(bold)Redstone$(): Y=-59 (Iron pick+)$(li)$(bold)Diamond$(): Y=-59 (Iron pick+)$(li)$(bold)Emerald$(): Y=232 (Iron pick+, Mountains)$(br2)The companion automatically goes to the best Y-level and auto-crafts the required pickaxe tier.

pages.title: Universal Torch Crafting
pages.text: All mining tasks automatically handle lighting:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Pre-mine$() — Pulls torches from storage chests, or crafts from coal+sticks$(li)$(bold)Mid-mine$() — Crafts torches from coal/charcoal and sticks found while mining$(li)$(bold)Full chain$() — If no sticks, crafts from planks. If no planks, converts logs.$(li)$(bold)Wall fallback$() — If floor torch can't be placed, places a wall torch instead$(br2)Torches are placed every 8 blocks in all tunnel types. You never need to worry about carrying torches!
